document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Ingdal's Arm..
document_data.name: Ingdal's Arm
document_data.mainbody: '''Ingdal's Arm''' was a [[human]] settlement in [[Aglarond]]. It was the westernmost settlement in Aglarond, and was not far from the edge of the [[Yuirwood]]. It bordered [[Altumbel]].
document_data.Description: In [[1368 DR]], Ingdal's Arm was a quiet fishing town with a population of around one thousand, made up of roughly half [[human]]s and half [[half-elves]].  The adventurer known as [[The Masked One]] made a home in Ingdal's Arm.
document_data.History:
It was settled in [[756 DR]].<ref>

The settlement was the site of the [[Battle of Ingdal's Arm]] in [[1065 DR]] [[Fennibal Bale|Fennibal "Thunder" Bale]] was a hero of the Battle of Ingdal's Arm, who famously charged into the enemy infantry, single-handedly pushing them all back. Fennibal sacrificed his life in the heroic deed allowing his side – the [[half-elves]] win the battle and eventually gain independence.
